Posts.Content: ferrajina wrote: This is my first time ever on a conversation/message board.  I am 37 yrs old and a survivor of breast cancer.  I have reached the final stage of my breast reconstruction - the Nipple &  Areolar.  I had surgery 2 days ago and feel pain in my lower abdominal area where they took the skin to make the areolar for both breasts.  Is there anyone out there that has had this surgery done?  Or is thinking about doing it?  I am reaching out to all the woman that has experienced everything I've been through in the past year - double mastectomy, breast recontruction, chemotherapy for 4 months, HER-2 positive (taking Herceptin until August 2008), taking tamoxifen, etc... I need to talk to other breast cancer survivors...     Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nipple - Areolar Reconstruction ferrajina candy2007
